assessment_item.data:
{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

செல்லானது அதிகப்படியான ATP-யை கொண்டிருந்தால் எந்த ஒன்று தடைப்படும்?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

கிரெப்ஸ் சுழற்சி

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1858"},{"text":"

கிளைக்காலைசிஸ்      

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1859"},{"text":"

ஆக்ஸிஜனேற்ற பாஸ்பரிகரணம் 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1989"},{"text":"

எலக்ட்ரான் கடத்து

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1994"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LC4VMA-Q16-செல்லானது அதிகப்படியான ATP-யை கொண்டிருந்தால் எந்த ஒன்று தடைப்படும்?","title":"LC4VMA-Q16-செல்லானது அதிகப்படியான ATP-யை கொண்டிருந்தால் எந்த ஒன்று தடைப்படும்?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"DIFFICULT","contentType":"Resource","mimeType":"application/vnd.ekstep.ecml-archive","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}
